title: Random Stutter/FPS Lag
body: Not sure if anyone else is experiencing this but I had it bad in a game that caused me to reset my client to fix it. I would go from 200 FPS too 10-30 FPS

replies.body: It did, I at first didn't think it was part of that because the update was a while back and non of my other games were affected. I still get a lil bit of frame lag at the start of the game but it has been fixed since i disabled the DVR function. Thank you

If you're running Windows 10, this could be caused by the Windows 10 Anniversary update that enabled *game DVR* in the windows game bar. I recommend [disabling this feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the issue.

Let me know if this helped.
